name: QR Code Scanner for Android - WeScan
description: QR Code Scanner (WeScan) is a simple and user-friendly free app that lets you easily scan both barcodes and QR codes. Just launch the app, point your camera at the code, and you are done! Its is very quick and provides accurate results on the fly. It supports all types of information QR code might contain.  WeScan is by definition a QR code scanner, although it can also read barcodes like Data Matrix, EAN, UPC and more. Our Apps main attraction is its fast QR code readability. It is not just a simple QR code and barcode scanning utility. It will also turn your mobile device into a QR/Barcode generator.   As for the apps features, theres a history log that saves all your scanned QR codes and their respective contents. The history log of our QR Code Scanner is very useful as it allows you to perform simple actions with ease. You can open the link of the code, change its name, delete it, etc.   With this QR Code Scanner you can scan codes using your mobile devices camera or have the information decoded from a photo of a code. Once you scan a code, the information plus the codes format will be displayed on screen. You can then do something like sharing the content via email, SMS, etc.   This QR/Barcode Scanner supports a wide range of barcodes including EAN, UPC, ISBN, QR codes, etc. It is intended to share the information of a scanned code rather than viewing its content instantly.  WeScan is a robust scanner that only does it all while occupying a small space of your mobile devices internal memory! With this app you can also create and customize your own QR codes using the in-app QR code maker. They are easy to set up and customize.   This QR Code Reader lets you perform all the necessary actions with the information you receive from a code. For example, if you get a phone number, youll be offered to make a call or to add it into your contact list.   This QR/Barcode Reader is very fast and very user-friendly, our app scans the QR Code or barcode automatically when you point the device at it and maintains a scan history!  If you are looking to scan QR codes and generate your own, WeScan is a great pick, completely free and its available on all main operating systems. A must have for all QR code enthusiasts.
